title: Charter High Schools Proposed, Weekly Congress Update, Money And Stress
teaser: A recent report shows that more than 25 percent of Americans feel stressed about money most or all of the time. We learn some ways to manage that stress. We also discuss whether Congress will vote to use armed force in Syria during our weekly Congressional roundup. Plus, a state representative shares details on a proposal to allow technical colleges to open their own charter high schools.
